text:
super super grateful for the staffs from this outlet for tanking my huge order this noon üôè

was looking to get meals for 25 pax and ordered from deliveroo to order for later. i was honestly expecting the order to be rejected, assuming that this branch may attract quite a physical crowd but they nailed the order! (ordered vegan and vegetarian bowls and wraps as well)

exceptional service and good food as always, thank you to the staffs at plaza sing stuffd!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Nick, Agustina, Ela and Jasmine served the daily bowl and kebab I ordered really quickly! There was a slight hiccup with my order but their service recovery was amazing :) thank you so much

Stuff‚Äôd is stuff‚Äôd as you would expect from any other branch. What makes the one at Plaza Singapura special is their staff. Nick, Agustins, Jasmine and Ila are friendly faces that ensure my orders are perfect. In particular, Nick goes above and beyond each time he takes my order.

i ordered deli bowl on the 19/04/25 around 2:38pm-2:42pm. i ordered from plaza sing before but idk what is wrong with this indian staff today. i told the staff only cucumber no lettuce but she still grabbing the lettuce to put it in until i had to literally stop her. then i told her roasted sesame sauce she look genuinely confused. the portion she gave was also very little. usually it's a scoop of ingredients but i'm giving such puny portions literally less than a scoop and i'm still paying full price for it. i love the deli bowl but this experience made me really disappointed and honestly quite frustrating
I was served by Cecelia who was an extremely conscientious staff who was very attentive to my needs. üôèüôèüôè
